examples: afraid even to turn his head

results.definition: filled with regret or concern; used often to soften an unpleasant statement
examples: I'm afraid I won't be able to come
he was afraid he would have to let her go

results.definition: feeling worry or concern or insecurity
examples: She was afraid that I might be embarrassed
I am afraid we have witnessed only the first phase of the conflict

results.definition: having feelings of aversion or unwillingness
